definition: gold/chemical element Au/generic term for lustrous and ductile metals/money/golden/highly respected/one of the eight categories of ancient musical instruments 八音[ba1 yin1]

(of taste) hot or pungent/hard/laborious/suffering/eighth in order/eighth of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/letter "H" or Roman "VIII" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/ancient Chinese compass point: 285°/octa

sentences.english: Anchor wires should have a Spelter type socket at anchor side.
sentences.chinese: 拋錨繩靠錨的一端應使用鋅壓頭。

sentences.english: An excess of zinc, for example, can interfere with absorption of other nutrients, including iron and copper.
sentences.chinese: 比如，過量的鋅會妨礙鐵和銅等其他營養成分吸收。

sentences.english: Change the Zink block of cathodic Protection.
The method has been applied in the determination of Zn2+in wastewater with a satisfactory result.
sentences.chinese: 應用該方法進行了鍍鋅廢液中鋅的測定，結果滿意。

sentences.english: Objective:To evaluate the efficacy and safty of zinc pyrithione spray against psoriasis.
sentences.chinese: 目的評價吡啶硫鋅氣霧劑治療銀屑病的療效和安全性。

sentences.english: Iron and zinc doping can lower the transformation temperature of anatase to rutile.
sentences.chinese: 鐵及鋅的摻雜會降低銳鈦晶向金紅石的轉變溫度。

sentences.english: Ball joint housing is an outer ring of radial spherical plain bearing, made of zinc base alloy.
sentences.chinese: 球頭座爲向心關節軸承的外圈，由鋅基合金製成。

sentences.english: Objective: In this study, the zinc bioavailability of natural and broken Masson pine pollen was determined.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究天然和破壁松花粉中鋅的生物利用度。

sentences.english: Coating characteristic of zinc-nickel alloy was analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 分析了鋅鎳合金鍍層特點。

sentences.english: In this paper, the damage mechanism of Zn leaching cinder volatile kiln lining is studied.
sentences.chinese: 本文對鋅浸出渣揮發窯窯襯破損機理進行了系統研究。

sentences.english: The utility model relates to a zinc concentrate fluidized roaster.
sentences.chinese: 本實用新型涉及一種鋅精礦沸騰焙燒爐。

sentences.english: Technology of obtaining Zinc-based sintered coating with globular Zinc powder was studied.
sentences.chinese: 探索了球狀鋅粉鋅基燒結塗層的基本工藝條件。

sentences.english: Zinc metal reacts with hydrochloric acid to produce bubbles of hydrogen gas and zinc chloride.
sentences.chinese: 金屬鋅與鹽酸反應產生氫氣泡和氯化鋅。

sentences.english: But, if blood is calcic content is exorbitant, can hamper zincic absorption.
sentences.chinese: 但是，如果血鈣含量過高，則會妨礙鋅的吸收。

sentences.english: The paper introduced the characteristics of several zinc-rich coatings anti the method of zinc content measurement.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了幾種富鋅塗料的特點及其鋅含量的測定方法。
